## ContractCallPayloadBuilder class

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use [SmartContractTransactionsFactory](sdk-core.smartcontracttransactionsfactory.md) instead.
> 
> A builder for [TransactionPayload](sdk-core.transactionpayload.md) objects, to be used for Smart Contract execution transactions.
> 

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractCallPayloadBuilder 
```
